verses.verse: Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from my enemies, <S%H341><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%> Set me on high <S%H7682><s%> from those who rise up against me. <S%H6965><s%>
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%> Save <S%H3467><s%> me from the bloodthirsty <S%H1818><s%> men. <S%H582><s%>

For, <S%H693><s%> behold, they lie in wait for my soul. <S%H5315><s%> The mighty <S%H5794><s%> gather <S%H1481><s%> themselves together against me, <S%H6588><s%> not for my disobedience, nor for my sin, <S%H2403><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
I have done no wrong, <S%H5771><s%> yet they are ready <S%H3559><s%> to attack <S%H7323><s%> me. <S%H5782><s%> Rise up, <S%H7200><s%> behold, and help me! <S%H7125><s%>

You, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh God <S%H430><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> rouse <S%H6974><s%> yourself to punish <S%H6485><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%> Show no mercy <S%H2603><s%> to the wicked <S%H205><s%> traitors. <S%H898><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
They return <S%H7725><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> howling <S%H1993><s%> like dogs, <S%H3611><s%> and prowl around <S%H5437><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>
Behold, <S%H5042><s%> they spew with their mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Swords <S%H2719><s%> are in their lips, <S%H8193><s%> "For, <S%H8085><s%>" they say, "who hears us?"
But you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, laugh <S%H7832><s%> at them. <S%H3932><s%> You scoff at all the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
Oh, <S%H5797><s%> my Strength, I watch <S%H8104><s%> for you, <S%H430><s%> for God is my high tower. <S%H4869><s%>
My God <S%H430><s%> will go before <S%H6923><s%> me with his loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will let me look <S%H7200><s%> at my enemies in triumph. <S%H8324><s%>

Don't <S%H2026><s%> kill them, <S%H5971><s%> or my people may forget. <S%H7911><s%> Scatter <S%H5128><s%> them by your power, <S%H2428><s%> and bring them down, <S%H3381><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> our shield. <S%H4043><s%>

For the sin <S%H2403><s%> of their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and the words <S%H1697><s%> of their lips, <S%H8193><s%> let them be caught <S%H3920><s%> in their pride, <S%H1347><s%> for the curses <S%H423><s%> and lies <S%H3585><s%> which they utter. <S%H5608><s%>

Consume <S%H3615><s%> them in wrath. <S%H2534><s%> Consume <S%H3615><s%> them, <S%H3045><s%> and they will be no more. Let them know that God <S%H430><s%> rules <S%H4910><s%> in Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
At evening <S%H6153><s%> let them return. <S%H7725><s%> Let them howl <S%H1993><s%> like a dog, <S%H3611><s%> and go around <S%H5437><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>
They shall wander up and down <S%H5128><s%> for food, <S%H398><s%> and wait <S%H3885><s%> all night if they aren't <S%H7646><s%> satisfied.

But I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of your strength. <S%H5797><s%> Yes, <S%H7442><s%> I will sing aloud of your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning. <S%H1242><s%> For you have been my high tower, <S%H4869><s%> a refuge <S%H4498><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress. <S%H6862><s%>
To you, <S%H5797><s%> my strength, I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises. <S%H430><s%> For God is my high tower, <S%H4869><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my mercy. <S%H2617><s%>
